languages.text: {n}Сами того не замечая, вы переходите на голос, который использовали в {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}бывшей жизни{/d} — твердый, не терпящий сомнений и возражений тон комиссара.{/n}
{n}You do not even notice the moment when you switch to the voice you used in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former life{/d} — the firm, uncompromising tone of a Commissar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сами того не замечая, вы переходите на голос, который использовали в {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}бывшей жизни{/d} — твердый, не терпящий сомнений и возражений тон комиссара.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You do not even notice the moment when you switch to the voice you used in your former life — the firm, uncompromising tone of a Commissar.{/n}
{n}You do not even notice the moment when you switch to the voice you used in your former life — the firm, uncompromising tone of a Commissar.{/n}
{n}You do not even notice the moment when you switch to the voice you used in your former life — the firm, uncompromising tone of a Commissar.{/n}
{n}You do not even notice the moment when you switch to the voice you used in your former life — the firm, uncompromising tone of a Commissar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}前世{/d}で使っていた声に切り替わった瞬間にさえ気づかない。コミッサーの断固とした、妥協のない口調だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not even notice the moment when you switch to the voice you used in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former life{/d} — the firm, uncompromising tone of a Commissar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}前世{/d}で使っていた声に切り替わった瞬間にさえ気づかない。コミッサーの断固とした、妥協のない口調だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous ne vous apercevez même pas que vous avez pris un ton familier issu de votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}ancienne vie{/d} : la diction ferme et sans appel d'{mf|un|une} commissaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not even notice the moment when you switch to the voice you used in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former life{/d} — the firm, uncompromising tone of a Commissar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous ne vous apercevez même pas que vous avez pris un ton familier issu de votre ancienne vie : la diction ferme et sans appel d'{mf|un|une} commissaire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你说这些话的时候，你下意识地以{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}政委{/d}的语气开了口。你的语气中充满了决心，没有一丝妥协。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not even notice the moment when you switch to the voice you used in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former life{/d} — the firm, uncompromising tone of a Commissar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你说这些话的时候，你下意识地以政委的语气开了口。你的语气中充满了决心，没有一丝妥协。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ni siquiera te percatas de que cambias la voz a aquella que usabas en tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}vida anterior{/d}: el tono firme e inflexible de {mf|un Comisario|una Comisaria}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not even notice the moment when you switch to the voice you used in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former life{/d} — the firm, uncompromising tone of a Commissar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ni siquiera te percatas de que cambias la voz a aquella que usabas en tu vida anterior: el tono firme e inflexible de {mf|un Comisario|una Comisaria}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst nicht einmal, wann du zu der Stimme wechselst, die du in deinem {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}früheren Leben{/d} verwendet hast – zu dem festen, kompromisslosen Ton {mf|eines Kommissars|einer Kommissarin}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not even notice the moment when you switch to the voice you used in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former life{/d} — the firm, uncompromising tone of a Commissar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst nicht einmal, wann du zu der Stimme wechselst, die du in deinem früheren Leben verwendet hast — zu dem festen, kompromisslosen Ton {mf|eines Kommissars|einer Kommissarin}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}Önceki hayatında{/d} kullandığın o Komiserlere yaraşır sert ve inatçı ses tonuyla konuşmaya başladığını fark etmiyorsun bile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not even notice the moment when you switch to the voice you used in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Commissar}former life{/d} — the firm, uncompromising tone of a Commissar.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Önceki hayatında kullandığın o Komiserlere yaraşır sert ve inatçı ses tonuyla konuşmaya başladığını fark etmiyorsun bile.{/n}
